dict.acceptation: 漫画；讽刺画；动画片；草图；

sent.orig: Their a cartoon-like look links Greek history with the modern Olympic Games.
sent.trans: 他们拥有渊源甚远的名字以及卡通可爱的形象，这就象征着希腊的历史与现代奥运的结合。

sent.orig: Yes, I have learned a lot from this cartoon, his optimism inspired me.
sent.trans: 好的，我从这部漫画里也学到很多，他的乐观精神鼓舞了我。

sent.orig: Sutras' Cartoon to graphs and makes the profound principles of Buddha to be understood.
sent.trans: 把佛经内容绘成图画，目的是为了帮助信众明白佛教义理。

sent.orig: Where do ask once Guang City please having selling the Japanese edition cartoon book?
sent.trans: 请问一下广东省廉江市哪里有卖日文原版漫画书？

sent.orig: Thank you. I forgot to watch TV. When does the cartoon show begin?
sent.trans: 谢谢。我忘记看电视了。卡通片什么时候开始？
